title: Sales and Marketing

desc: Hi there,My name's Edward.Together with my co-founder Till H. Gross I run Course Concierge, an online course production company that creates done-for-you video courses for NYT best-selling authors, TED speakers and subject-matter experts from numerous domains.We’ve built this company on the success of Till’s first company (see his TEDx talk with 2M views here [url removed, login to view] or hear Tim Ferriss rave about his work here [url removed, login to view] ) and lessons I’ve learned helping a renowned speaker launch an instant NYT bestseller, create a YouTube channel with 100,000,000 views and produce more than seven online products.Course Concierge has been a rapid success and we are expanding our team and looking for a young hot-shot copywriter/direct-response marketer who’s ready to prove himself/herself.For the right person, this is a Dream Job – and dream company.If you’re someone who…- Is dying to become a master marketer or copywriting virtuoso- Wants to work with the top people in various industries- Loves investigate research, understanding customers’ motivations, their pains and fears, and their hopes and dreams- Dreams insanely big and wants to live an extraordinary life- Gets excited by email open rates over 30% and dreams about lower CPAs- Is a terrific writer and questioner- Gets excited at the prospect of learning a tremendous amount, with fast-paced and varied demands- Is supremely well organised, a self-starter and very capable- Has an extreme drive to success and doesn’t stop until you’ve won- Wants to connect with powerful and successful people and build an insane network...This could be the opportunity you've been looking for.We’re a great company to join. Here’s why…- Course Concierge was founded less than a year ago, but already we’ve been tremendously successful. You will be coming in at ground level, and we put a huge emphasis on ‘homegrown’ talent. This means as long as you’re proactive there are NO LIMITS to how far you can grow in this role.- We have an unbelievably engaged team, with world-class people in every department (from video production to design to editorial).- Our clients are fantastic. We only take on a handful and are incredibly selective in who we work with. Our clients include NYT best-selling authors, TED Speakers, FBI advisers, Stanford professors, NFL coaches and YouTubers with hundreds of millions of views.- Integrity and honesty are our battle cry. Our clients come to us trusting that we understand that their reputation is more important than short-term revenue from the next launch.- You will get to work side-by-side with our CEO and learn a tremendous amount (and rub elbows with A-list celebrities and mingle with successful entrepreneurs).Your ResponsibilitiesYou will have three main responsibilites that blend into each other – all various facets of online marketing.1. Customer ResearchIn My Life In Advertising, Claude Hopkins wrote, “One of the greatest advertising men this country has developed [...] spent weeks in going from farm to farm to learn the farmers’ viewpoint. I have known him to ring a thousand doorbells to gain the [customer]'s angle.”If there’s one thing that is the foundation to become a great marketer, it’s understanding the customer's hopes and dreams as well as their pains and fears.We will teach you this!In the way that career progression at JP Morgan starts with being an analyst, our customer research will be a key part of your first months at Course Concierge.You’ll learn our proprietary customer research process that allows us to elicit holes in the market and drill down to what customers really want. It’s customers that put Course Concierge on the map in the shortest time possible. It’s part of our secret sauce and you’ll be the one to lead it.2. CopywritingWe live and breath copywriting. There’s no week in which we don’t throw around an Ogilvy quote or ponder an excerpt from Scientific Advertising. Our copy chief is one of the most accomplished copywriters around and there’s a good chance you’ve read her words. For years she wrote for the likes of Ramit Sethi, Ryan Levesque and Paul Walker (to name just a few).You'll learn how to write hard-hitting copy and get more real world-experience that you could get anywhere else. You’ll be thrown in at the deep end and get to write landing pages, craft social media posts, assemble Facebook ads, and write entire email series that are seen by millions.And you’ll write A LOT.3. Marketing ExecutionSetting up landing pages, coming up with split-tests, brainstorming promo videos, managing Facebook ads.You’ll be in the weeds of online marketing and get to execute massive campaigns. Instead of hoping to get a few more visitors on a blog a day, you’ll get to drive thousands of sales, build email lists with hundreds thousands of people, and assemble launches viewed by millions.It’s in your hands!People that have worked in a similar way with Till in the past have made massive jumps in their career. For example, Joe, who after 1.5 years of working with Till became the head of marketing at a venture-backed startup and even made it into the founders’ team.The key is initiative. We are moving insanely fast and we want you so we can move and execute even faster. For this reason we NEED someone who doesn’t wait to be told what to do. To get the most out of this role, you need to be proactive. Think there’s a great angle to market a product? Great. You’ll be the one to lead it.We believe in deliberate practice and deep work, to build tremendous amounts of “career capital”. We will have plenty to supply.SpecificsWe want someone who’s ready to hustle and work their ass off in-person together with Till. This means you either need to be based in Los Angeles or ready to relocate within the next month.You need to be a native English speaker. This will be a full-time position. Working hours will be long and hard. However, once in awhile they will be spiced up with a dinner in the Hollywood hills, a celebrity house party or a mid-day yoga session with a new potential client. Till loves bringing people around and it will be great way for you to build an incredible network.To apply...Send Till and I a pitch to recruiting@[url removed, login to view] on why you think you would be a great fit for the role, and confirm that you are either living in Los Angeles or ready (and able) to relocate.Please do not send a resume, CV or attachment of any kind. We don’t care where you went to college (or that you even went at all) — all that matters is whether you can do it. (To quote Claude Hopkins: I know nothing of value which an advertising man can be taught in college. I know of many things taught there which he will need to unlearn before he can steer any practical course.)Our deadline for submissions is Sunday October 1st, though those who apply sooner have an advantage.For those who stand out, we will set a small copywriting/marketing test and then set up a Zoom call to discuss the role further.We hope to find someone we will be working with for many years.Thank you for reading. Best of luck, and we look forward to hearing from you!Edward
title: Wanted: Young Hot-shot Copywriter/Direct Response Marketer For Online Course Company

Create framework using the material available on these webpages too make the content look more visually attractive - currently we have most of the content on web pages in a paragraph form. It will be good for the person hired to create framework to make it look visually attractive3. Review the content from SEO perspective and make it search friendlyExperience1. Good to have experience in writing/refining content for pharmaceutical/healthcare domain2. Solid general marketing copywriting experience of more than 5 years3. desc: We are a Digital Marketing company based out of Chennai, looking for purchasing links on your domains/partner domains.Requirement:1) Require to place Site wide links (Header/footer/body) such as naked URL or along with a keyword on the sites managed/owned by you.2) Either the TF and DA of the site should be above 10+ or the no. of pages should be higher then a minimum of 1000 pages for the domain.3) Require to purchase space for links for our client(s) domains on regular bases.Payment model:Model 1:Trust flow (TF) & Domain Authority (DA):TF, DA	Price/Month/Per Domain10+	$1015+	$1520+	$2025+	$2530+	$3035+	$3540+	$4045+ & above	$50ORModel 2:No. Of Pages	Price/Month/Per Domain1000+ pages	$105000+ pages	$1510,000+ pages	$2030,000 + Pages	$3060,000 + Pages	$401 Lakh & Above	$50Earning:Example of earning:If you gave us space to put links on 10 domains which were as follows:10+ (TF, DA) = 520+ (TF, DA)  = 330+ (TF, DA)  = 140+ (TF, DA) = 1Your earning for these domains each month would be $190.00 which would be about Rs. 12,160/- per month.Advantages:1) No space on pages sought.2) It can be hidden links/header or footer links or "Designed by".3) We do not require the links to be visible on front face of the site and only require them to show in code.​4) Weekly, by monthly, monthly payments - depending on what suits you.5) Earn lakhs every month by just sharing links.​​6) Require to buy links on more then 1000 domains each month.
title: Share links

desc: We are seeking Telemarketers to work at home to make 100+ calls every day and schedule 1-2 appointments per day with corporate executives at top U.S. financial institutions. This position affords the successful candidate an exciting opportunity to be a Telemarketer in a growing company and earn appointment setting bonuses (between $150-$300 U.S. dollars), commissions on sales (we pay 5% on the net sale). This is also a great way to gain something besides money - i.e. learn about U.S. financial companies as well as an exciting opportunity to work closely with some of the brightest minds on Wall Street in an informal work environment where collegiality and intellectual rigor are highly valued. We specialize in the financial services industry. No prior industry experience is required. Note: This is an INTENSE TELEPHONE ROLE. If you are not comfortable talking and selling on the telephone, please do not apply. If you are, we will give you all the support for success.Job Requirements: In order to make successful appointments, the candidate must:	Have prior experience in appointment setting	Have a good, working computer	Have a good, working computer	Have a reliable high-speed Internet connection	Excellent oral and written English skills	Make 100+ cold calls/follow up calls per day	Schedule 1 to 2 appointments consistently each day	Make 1 sale within the first 2 months. After the first 2 months, make one to 1-2 sales on a monthly basis	Have confident and talented telephone skills	Be highly motivated, aggressive, and self-starting	Execute on our proven sales methodologies, e.g. bypassing gatekeepers and giving rebuttals	Build a pipeline	Work Monday to Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Eastern time	Experience in using of a Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system such as Salesforce is a plusCompensation:	$3.00 to $5.00 U.S, dollars per hour depending on experience	Appointment setting bonuses of $150 U.S, dollars for 3 sales calls in 1 day	Appointment setting bonuses of $300 U.S, dollars for 5 sales calls in 1 day	Sales commissions of 5% of the net sale when appointments turn into sales.	Special bonuses for performing exceptional work
title: We need home based telemarketers immediately!

desc: Hi there.I used to work in telemarketing and the agency I was working for had a program where they were selling leads to clients. We are going to do the same here but this time we are the client buying leads. We are willing to pay £5-£200 per lead. The price for the lead depends on the quality. We will specify the tiers and requirements below.Please make sure you understand the project before submitting a proposal. Also, only UK based submissions accepted.The brief:We are a social media agency providing strategy development and management (we will include USP's and other branded materials). We are currently focusing on the UK and Ireland market only, so we will accept leads limited to the UK only. We will also create a public spreadsheet and calendar. Do not contact a company on our behalf which is already on the spreadsheet. Use the calendar to check my availability of when booking an appointment. Make sure to book two weeks in advance, not sooner.Do's:1. Be very polite on the phone2. Be honest. If you can't answer a question, then say so.3. Make the prospect feel comfortable and chatty4. Use everything at your disposal as long as it is appropriate. If you are not sure, please ask us. You can write emails, cold call, send presents if you think it will result in a higher tier lead.Don'ts:1. You are not part of our company. Always tell that you are representing us when stating your name and your agency if you are part of a business.2. Don't be pushy. If a person has no interest in talking to you so be it.3. Do not promise anything4. Do not negotiate pricing without our consentThe process:Step 1: Submit a proposalStep 2: We will send a welcome package with everything you will needStep 3: Generate LeadsStep 4: Let us know which lead category you haveStep 5: We put money in the escrow based on the category of the leadStep 6: You send the lead for verificationStep 7: We verify the lead and release the money from the escrowStep 8: We will request a new proposal after each submissionIn case you want to stop submitting leads, let us know and we cancel the project.Extra:If you have a good relationship with the person you spoke to, you can head up the sales process for a generous commission on single payment or monthly retainers when the prospect signs the contract. This is entirely up to you.Lead model:1. Contact information (First name, last name, job title, email, directphone line)2. Pain/project: What problem are they going to solve?3. Needs: Which requirements and wishes are being solved?4. Budget: Is budget allocated and how much?5. Timeframe: In what phase are they now? When will one decide?6. Authority: What is the role of the contact person? Who is the project leader?7. Book an appointment with usAlways include the date and time you contacted the prospect.Categories and pricing:Tier 6 [£5]: 1 + 2Tier 5 [£25]:  1 + 2 + 3Tier 4 [£50]: 1 + 2 + 3 + 4Tier 3 [£75]: 1 + 2 + 3 + 4 + 5Tier 2 [£100]: 1 + 2 + 3 + 4 + 5 + 6Tier 1 [£200]: All information + appointmentTier 0 [£200 + Commission]: Negotiation and deal closurePlease ask questions if something is unclear.
title: Lead generation campaign (cold calling, email, ...)
